Terms & Conditions

This page and any pages it links to explains Aasya Foundation’s terms of use. You must agree to these to use aasyafoundation.org

Who we are

Aasya Foundation is an Non-governmental organization (NGO) which and is non-profit. Aasya Foundation is based in India and will be referred to as ‘we’ from now on.

Using aasyafoundation.org

You agree to use aasyafoundation.org only for lawful purposes. You must also use it in a way that does not infringe the rights of, or restrict or inhibit the use and enjoyment of, this site by anyone else.

We update aasyafoundation.org all the time. We can change or remove content at any time without notice.

Linking to aasyafoundation.org

We welcome and encourage other websites to link to aasyafoundation.org.

You must contact us for permission if you want to either:

  • Charge your website’s users to click on a link to any page on aasyafoundation.org
  • Say your website is associated with or endorsed by aasyafoundation.org or another government department or agency

Linking from aasyafoundation.org

aasyafoundation.org links to websites that are managed by other government departments and agencies, service providers or other organisations. We do not have any control over the content on these websites.

We’re not responsible for:

  • The protection of any information you give to these websites
  • Any loss or damage that may come from your use of these websites, or any other websites they link to

You agree to release us from any claims or disputes that may come from using these websites.

You should read all terms and conditions, privacy policies and end user licences that relate to these websites before you use them.

Using aasyafoundation.org content

Most content on aasyafoundation.org is subject to copyright protection.

If any content is not subject to copyright protection, we’ll usually credit the author or copyright holder.

You can reproduce content published on aasyafoundation.org as long as you credit aasyafoundation.org or the particular author. Contact us if you want to reproduce any piece of content.

We make most of the content on aasyafoundation.org available through feeds for other websites and applications to use. The websites and applications that use our feeds are not our products, and they might use versions of our content that have been edited and stored for later use (‘cached’).

We do not give any guarantees, conditions or warranties about the accuracy or completeness of any content used by these products. We’re not liable for any loss or damage that may come from your use of these products.

The most up to date version of our content will always be on aasyafoundation.org

Disclaimer

While we make every effort to keep aasyafoundation.org up to date, we do not provide any guarantees, conditions or warranties that the information will be:

  • Current
  • Secure
  • Accure
  • Complete
  • Free from Bugs & viruses

We do not publish advice on aasyafoundation.org. You should get professional or specialist advice before doing anything on the basis of the content.

We’re not liable for any loss or damage that may come from using aasyafoundation.org. This includes:

  • Any direct, indirect or consequential losses
  • Any loss or damage caused by civil wrongs (‘tort’, including negligence), breach of contract or otherwise
  • The use of aasyafoundation.org and any websites that are linked to or from it
  • The inability to use aasyafoundation.org and any websites that are linked to or from it

This applies if the loss or damage was foreseeable, arose in the normal course of things or you advised us that it might happen.

This includes (but is not limited to) the loss of your:

  • Income or revenue
  • Salary, benefits or other payments
  • Business
  • Profits or contracts
  • Opportunity
  • Anticipated savings
  • Data
  • Goodwill or reputation
  • Tangible property
  • Intangible property, including loss, corruption or damage to data or any computer system
  • Wasted management or office time

Requests to remove content

You can ask for content to be removed from aasyafoundation.org. We’ll remove content:

  • in order to comply with data protection legislation covering the rights and freedoms of individuals
  • if it breaches copyright laws, contains sensitive personal data or material that may be considered obscene or defamatory

Contact us to ask for content to be removed. You’ll need to send us the web address (URL) of the content and explain why you think it should be removed. We’ll reply to let you know whether we’ll remove it.

We remove content at our discretion in discussion with the department or agency responsible for it.

Information about you and your visits to aasyafoundation.org

We collect information about you in accordance with our privacy policy and our cookie policy. By using aasyafoundation.org, you agree to us collecting this information and confirm that any data you provide is accurate.

Virus protection

We make every effort to check and test aasyafoundation.org for viruses at every stage of production. You must make sure that the way you use aasyafoundation.org does not expose you to the risk of viruses, malicious computer code or other forms of interference which can damage your computer system.

We’re not responsible for any loss, disruption or damage to your data or computer system that might happen when you use aasyafoundation.org

Viruses, Hacking and Other offences

When using aasyafoundation.org you must not introduce viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs or any other material that’s malicious or technologically harmful.

When using aasyafoundation.org you must not introduce viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs or any other material that’s malicious or technologically harmful.

You must not attack aasyafoundation.org in any way. This includes denial-of-service attacks.

We’ll report any attacks or attempts to gain unauthorised access to aasyafoundation.org to the relevant law enforcement authorities and share information about you with them.

Governing law

These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Republic Of India.

Any dispute you have which relates to these terms and conditions, or your use of aasyafoundation.org (whether it be contractual or non-contractual), will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of India.

General

There may be legal notices elsewhere on aasyafoundation.org that relate to how you use the site.

We’re not liable if we fail to comply with these terms and conditions because of circumstances beyond our reasonable control.

We might decide not to exercise or enforce any right available to us under these terms and conditions. We can always decide to exercise or enforce that right at a later date.

Doing this once will not mean we automatically waive the right on any other occasion.

If any of these terms and conditions are held to be invalid, unenforceable or illegal for any reason, the remaining terms and conditions will still apply.

Changes to these terms and conditions

Please check these terms and conditions regularly. We can update them at any time without notice.

You’ll agree to any changes if you continue to use aasyafoundation.org after the terms and conditions have been updated
